  50. ‌struct ngx_log_s {
  51.     ngx_uint_t           log_level;
  52.     ngx_open_file_t     *file;

  54.     ngx_atomic_uint_t    connection;

  56.     ngx_log_handler_pt   handler;
  57.     void                *data;

  59.     ngx_log_writer_pt    writer;
  60.     void                *wdata;

  62.     /*
  63.      * we declare "action" as "char *" because the actions are usually
  64.      * the static strings and in the "u_char *" case we have to override
  65.      * their types all the time
  66.      */

  68.     char                *action;

  70.     ngx_log_t           *next;
  71. };

  83. ‌#define ngx_log_error(level, log, ...)                                        \
  84.     if ((log)->log_level >= level) ngx_log_error_core(level, log, __VA_ARGS__)

  86. void ngx_log_error_core(ngx_uint_t level, ngx_log_t *log, ngx_err_t err,
  87.     const char *fmt, ...);

  89. ‌#define ngx_log_debug(level, log, ...)                                        \
  90.     if ((log)->log_level & level)                                             \
  91.         ngx_log_error_core(NGX_LOG_DEBUG, log, __VA_ARGS__)

  93. /*********************************/

  95. #elif (NGX_HAVE_GCC_VARIADIC_MACROS)

  97. ‌#define NGX_HAVE_VARIADIC_MACROS  1

  99. ‌#define ngx_log_error(level, log, args...)                                    \
  100.     if ((log)->log_level >= level) ngx_log_error_core(level, log, args)

  102. void ngx_log_error_core(ngx_uint_t level, ngx_log_t *log, ngx_err_t err,
  103.     const char *fmt, ...);

  105. ‌#define ngx_log_debug(level, log, args...)                                    \
  106.     if ((log)->log_level & level)                                             \
  107.         ngx_log_error_core(NGX_LOG_DEBUG, log, args)

  109. /*********************************/

  111. #else /* NO VARIADIC MACROS */

  113. ‌#define NGX_HAVE_VARIADIC_MACROS  0

  239. /*
  240. * ngx_write_stderr() cannot be implemented as macro, since
  241. * MSVC does not allow to use #ifdef inside macro parameters.
  242. *
  243. * ngx_write_fd() is used instead of ngx_write_console(), since
  244. * CharToOemBuff() inside ngx_write_console() cannot be used with
  245. * read only buffer as destination and CharToOemBuff() is not needed
  246. * for ngx_write_stderr() anyway.
  247. */
  248. static ngx_inline void
  249. ‌ngx_write_stderr(char *text)
  250. {
  251.     (void) ngx_write_fd(ngx_stderr, text, ngx_strlen(text));
  252. }


  255. extern ngx_module_t  ngx_errlog_module;
  256. extern ngx_uint_t    ngx_use_stderr;


  259. #endif /* _NGX_LOG_H_INCLUDED_ */
